did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.p: This is a varied collection of photographs from many events and celebrations for the ILR School. Included are photographs from the Library, Student activities, Award dinners, Conferences, Faculty meetings, as well as photographs of each Dean of the school.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Photographs Archival Collection #6038 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
